name: Countdown to happiness?
description:
This is a love-themed adventure puzzle game. In this game, the player takes on the role of a girl who plays an adventure game with her fiance. The player can go through her love diary, recall the story of her love affair and get props by rolling a dice. Will the seemingly sweet path lead to a happy ending? Help the girl make her choice!

The production team is all girls. We hope that players (regardless of gender) who play this game will take a more cautious look at unhealthy relationships in love. After all, real life is not something you can escape from just by the luck of a roll of dice.
